snippet: President François Hollande said Serge Lazarevic, kidnapped in Mali, had been the last French hostage anywhere in the world.
abstract: France's Pres Francois Hollande says Serge Lazarevic, captive held by Al Qaeda affiliate in North Africa for more than three years, has been freed in Mali.

byline.contributor: Dan Bilefsky contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: President François Hollande said Serge Lazarevic, kidnapped in Mali, had been the last French hostage anywhere in the world.

headline.main: French Hostage Abducted in North Africa Is Freed
headline.print_headline: French Hostage Abducted in North Africa Is Freed

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations
